verbs.description: [V: ask] [ARG1: smart questions] [ARGM-TMP: when interviewing for a job a job interview is a two - way street] the employer asks questions to determine if the interviewee is an ideal fit for the job and the smart candidate uses the interview to assess how he or she would fit in if the candidate would be able to do his or her best work there and how well - aligned the candidate goals are with those of the employer forbes
